arts.ttl: Raúl Jiménez breaks Mexico's Nations League curse
arts.sum: A penalty sealed Mexico's first-ever Concacaf Nations League title, with Raúl Jiménez emerging as the star of El Tri. His two goals were crucial in securing a 2-1 victory over Panama at SoFi Stadium, finally delivering the long-awaited championship. Adalberto Carrasquilla fired a powerful shot from outside the box, but Luis Malagón made a crucial save to keep the game level.

arts.ttl: Mexico beats Panama 2-1 to win CONCACAF Nations League title on late penalty from Raúl Jiménez
arts.sum: Raúl Jiménez scored his second goal on a penalty kick in the second minute of second-half stoppage time, and Mexico beat Panama 2-1 Sunday night to win the CONCACAF Nations League tournament for the first time. Adalberto Carrasquilla scored on a penalty in first-half injury time for underdog Panama, which staged a dramatic 1-0 upset of the host U.S. on Thursday night to reach the final.

arts.ttl: Tigres 25-26 Third Kit Leaked - Inspired by Mexico 1970 World Cup
arts.sum: Details have been shared by Tigres shirt experts @TigresJersey about Tigres UANL's third kit for the 2025-26 season, with the Adidas-designed jersey drawing inspiration from Mexico's footballing heritage.

arts.ttl: Mexico vs Panama: Time, date and how to watch the 2025 Concacaf Nations League final
arts.sum: A s a reissue of the 2023 Gold Cup final, the representatives of Mexico and Panama will face each other in an all-or-nothing match at the SoFi Stadium for the title of the Concacaf Nations League, after having passed the difficult tests of their counterparts from Canada and United States, respectively. The final of the 2023 Gold Cup between Mexico and Panama will take place at the SoFi Stadium in Inglewood, California

arts.ttl: Exclusive | Genoa’s Johan Vasquez interests Juventus and Atalanta
